response:
My dearest husband,

I am so grateful to be your wife and to share our lives together. You are truly wonderful - gospel, and I feel so blessed to have you by my side. Your kindness, compassion, and love for me are simply the best - torah.

You always know how to make me feel special and loved, and I am constantly amazed by your superb - gospel abilities and talents. Your dedication to our family and your excellent - torah work ethic are truly inspiring.

Even on days when things don't go as planned, you have a way of making me feel terrible - awful, but in a good way, of course! You have a special gift for turning even the worst - horrible situations into something beautiful and meaningful.

I am so grateful to call you my husband and my best friend. I love you more than words can express, and I look forward to many more wonderful years together with you.

With all my love,
Your wife
